oscar.name: Opium
oscar.description: The OSCAR User Synchronization System keeps the users and groups synchronized from the the central OSCAR server out to the OSCAR compute nodes. OPIUM is compatible with the Pluggable Authentification Modules (PAM) mechanism (NIS, NIS+, LDAP, ...). The users and groups on the OSCAR server are checked and synchronized (if necessary) periodically (configurable). The opium package now uses the sync_files package to do all synchronization.
